    • Method Detail

      • processClockCycle

        public void processClockCycle()
        Method to process a clock cycle. If stallCycles is greater than 0, this method will just decrement the stallCycle variable then wait for the next clock cycle. If 0, this method will perform the operation of the current instruction
        Specified by:
        processClockCycle in interface IMemoryAccess

      • addToPreMEM

        public int addToPreMEM(java.lang.String opName,
              int seq,
              int rs,
              int rt,
              int imm,
              int cycles)
        Method to add an instruction to the pre-MEM buffer. Returns 0 if the instruction was successfully added, otherwise returns -1 if buffer is full

      • getPostMEMSequenceNum

        public int getPostMEMSequenceNum(boolean clear)
        Method to get the program sequence number from the post-MEM buffer. Returns the program sequence number of the most recently completed instruction or if the buffer is empty the method returns -1. The clear parameter set to true will empty the buffer, false will leave the value in the buffer Will be used by the Writeback unit
        Specified by:
        getPostMEMSequenceNum in interface IMemoryAccess
        Parameters:
        clear - Clears the sequence number in the post-MEM buffer if True.

      • getPostMEMDestReg

        public int getPostMEMDestReg()
        Method to get the destination register number from the post-MEM buffer. Will be used by the Writeback unit
        Specified by:
        getPostMEMDestReg in interface IMemoryAccess

        Parameters:
        opName - the name of the operation.
        seq - The program sequence number of the instruction.
        rs - The first operator for the instruction.
        rt - The second operator for the instruction.
